mapper.sql: upc_id, user_id, pinboard_id, comment, like_num, up_create_time
mapper.select: SELECT upc.upc_id AS commentId, upc.pinboard_id AS pinboardId, upc.up_create_time AS date, upc.`comment` AS content, upc.like_num AS likeNum, u.user_avatar_url AS fromAvatar, u.user_username AS fromName FROM users as u INNER JOIN users_pinboards_comments AS upc ON u.user_id=upc.user_id WHERE upc.pinboard_id=#{pinId} ORDER BY upc.up_create_time LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT u2.user_username AS comment_author, u1.user_username AS pin_author, pin.pinboard_title, pin.pinboard_content, pin.pinboard_bgimg_url, cc.`comment`, cc.up_create_time, cc.like_num FROM( SELECT up.user_id AS pin_author, upc.user_id AS comment_author, upc.pinboard_id, upc.`comment`, upc.up_create_time, upc.like_num FROM users_pinboards AS up INNER JOIN users_pinboards_comments AS upc ON up.pinboard_id=upc.pinboard_id) as cc INNER JOIN users AS u1 ON u1.user_id=cc.pin_author INNER JOIN users AS u2 ON u2.user_id=cc.comment_author INNER JOIN pinboards AS pin ON pin.pinboard_id=cc.pinboard_id
